content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate production at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
-  Burner inserter at position(x=60.5, y=-61.5)
-  Burner inserter at position(x=61.5, y=-61.5)
-  Wooden chest at position(x=62.5, y=-61.5)
-  Burner inserter at position(x=62.5, y=-60.5)

### Electricity generation at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
-  Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Offshore pump at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5)
-  Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group at position(x=111.5, y=-33.5)
-  Small electric pole at position(x=119.5, y=-30.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item function
-  Ensure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it.
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Make sure the entities are close enough to be connected.
-  Ensure the path between the entities is clear of obstacles.
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when using burner inserters
-  Ensure the inserter has fuel before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it.
### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure the steam engine has a fluid input before attempting to use it.

### NAMESPACE
-  `insert_item`: function to insert items into an entity. 
    -  Failure mode: attempting to insert an item that is not in the inventory.
    -  Success mode: successfully inserting an item into an entity.
-  `connect_entities`: function to connect two entities.
    -  Failure mode: attempting to connect entities that are too far apart.
    -  Success mode: successfully connecting two entities.
-  Important variables:
    -  `inserter_3`: BurnerInserter entity
    -  `coal`: item
    -  `transport-belt`: item
    -  `small-electric-pole`: item
    -  `pipe`: item
    -  `stone-furnace`: item
    -  `wood`: item
    -  `iron-ore`: item
    -  `copper-ore`: item
    -  `iron-plate`: item
    -  `copper-plate`: item
    -  `copper-cable`: item
    -  `iron-gear-wheel`: item
